lead.headline: Higher Prices, Less Coverage: Your Stories of the Home Insurance Crunch
lead.summary: Home insurance prices have risen drastically in areas most exposed to climate-related risk, like California and Florida. And research shows the effects of the higher rates are also spilling over into the broader real estate market.
